#summary Software for the Arduino

= Software =

== Required libraries ==

The default Arduino does require additional libraries.

|| *Library* || *Source* || *Note* ||
|| Aduino TVOUT   || [http://code.google.com/p/arduino-tvout/downloads/detail?name=TVoutBeta1.zip&can=2&q= Download]         || ||
|| rx5808-pro V97 || [http://big-bonsai.de/files/rx5808_pro_v1-0.zip rx5808_pro_v97.zip] || Bugfix: keydebounce, Extened RSSI values, Default PAL system ||
|| rx5808-pro V1.0 || [http://big-bonsai.de/files/rx5808_pro_v1-0.zip rx5808_pro_v1-0.zip] || Initial version ||

== Source Code ==

The software is one aduino file.

You may check it out from google.

A direct download is no longer supported by code.google.com,
but simply use the code view and use copy / paste:

[http://code.google.com/p/rx5808-pro/source/browse/trunk/rx5808_pro/rx5808_pro.ino rx5808_pro.ino]

Sorry... or tell me how to make it simplier. ;-)

For Adruion GUI, you need to place this in a sketch folder like this:

{{{
   rx5808_pro (directory)
       +---- rx5808_pro.ino
}}}
